name: Sternfrost Prism
title: Cryo Hypostasis: Sternfrost Prism
desc: Despite its highly stable form and almost machine-like movements, it must still meticulously defend its weak spot...
inPlayDescription: After Cryo Hypostasis, who has this card equipped, triggers Cryo Crystal Core: Attach Sheer Cold to the opposing active character.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Cryo Hypostasis at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: Can only be played if your active character is Cryo Hypostasis: Attach Cryo Crystal Core to them.After Cryo Hypostasis, who has this card equipped, triggers Cryo Crystal Core: Attach Sheer Cold to the opposing active character.(Your deck must contain Cryo Hypostasis to add this card to your deck)

Can only be played if your active character is Cryo Hypostasis: Attach Cryo Crystal Core to them. After Cryo Hypostasis, who has this card equipped, triggers Cryo Crystal Core: Attach Sheer Cold to the opposing active character. (Your deck must contain Cryo Hypostasis to add this card to your deck)
